problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,E,F,D分别是边AB、AC、BC上的点,且满足\frac{AE}{EB}=\frac{AF}{FC}=\frac{1}{3},则四边形AEDF占△ABC面积的()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, E, F, and D are vertices on the edges AB, AC, and BC respectively, and satisfy \frac{AE}{EB}=\frac{AF}{FC}=\frac{N_0}{N_1}, then the quadrilateral AEDF accounts for the area of △ABC ()
raw_answer: 解:连接EF,∵\frac{AE}{EB}=\frac{AF}{FC}=\frac{1}{3},∴EF∥BC,∴△AEF∽△ABC,∴S~△AEF~:S~△ABC~=1:16,∵△AEF和△DEF有同底EF,∴S~△AEF~:~S△DEF~=1:3,∴四边形AEDF占△ABC面积的\frac{1}{4}．故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了相似三角形的判定和性质,解题的关键是熟悉相似三角形的性质:相似三角形的面积比是相似比的平方．
